text:
@realDonaldTrump LOSER,LOSER,LOSER, pants on fire. Lil' Donnie is losing his war on the #coronavirus that he created when he ignored @PeterNavarroUSA warnings of the incoming pandemic. Then he put @VP in charge. The man who neglected the HIV outbreak in his state of #Indiana. 
@WhiteHouse
